data.message: beat sounds trash and em gotta stop with the 'every word gotta rhyme' trash. Its impressive technically from a vocab perspective but in terms of sounding nice to listen too its poor.

replies.message: But I like his multi-syllabal rhyme patterns...If he was to stop that flow then fans like me won't get to hear it lol everyones opinions different

oh i agree everyone has an opinion for sure. Its just my favorite em tracks are the slick flow when he would flare the syllable patterns when required if it sounded unforced. 

Now it seems the criticism of poor content of the 'fack' era have em trying too hard its at the cost of good sounding hip hop.
Stfu go listen. To Justin bieber
